# pop-mask



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Mask crops the content of the element to common shapes.



## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                 | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | Default     |
|--------|--------|-----------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------|
| `type` | `type` | Mask that should be applied | `"circle" \| "decagon" \| "diamond" \| "heart" \| "hexagon" \| "hexagon-2" \| "parallelogram" \| "parallelogram-2" \| "parallelogram-3" \| "parallelogram-4" \| "pentagon" \| "square" \| "squircle" \| "star" \| "star-2" \| "triangle" \| "triangle-2" \| "triangle-3" \| "triangle-4"` | `'squircle` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description               |
|----|---------------------------|
| `` | content that get croped   |
